formattedAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Chu has been our pediatrician since birth. She is extremely competent, positive, explains everything in an easy to follow manner and gives you the right tools to be confident and successful as a new parent. She is a real find.

text.text: Dr. Chu has been our pediatrician since birth. She is extremely competent, positive, explains everything in an easy to follow manner and gives you the right tools to be confident and successful as a new parent. She is a real find.

originalText.text: Dr. Chu is great and very knowledgeable. I like that she gives us follow up plans in case certain scenarios happen when we are home. She explains everything thoroughly which makes us feel very comfortable as new parents. She tells us signs to look out for, what is normal at certain ages and what is not. Overall we feel very comfortable with our daughter being under Dr. Chu’s care.

text.text: Dr. Chu is great and very knowledgeable. I like that she gives us follow up plans in case certain scenarios happen when we are home. She explains everything thoroughly which makes us feel very comfortable as new parents. She tells us signs to look out for, what is normal at certain ages and what is not. Overall we feel very comfortable with our daughter being under Dr. Chu’s care.

originalText.text: Dr. May Chu is amazing. In the six years she's been caring for our daughter, she has been quick to flag potential issues and refer us to wonderful specialists. She is also warm, funny and has really paid attention to our child's unique personality from the time she was an infant. Our child loves her, and because of that she loves going to the doctor. I couldn't ask for better.

text.text: Dr. May Chu is amazing. In the six years she's been caring for our daughter, she has been quick to flag potential issues and refer us to wonderful specialists. She is also warm, funny and has really paid attention to our child's unique personality from the time she was an infant. Our child loves her, and because of that she loves going to the doctor. I couldn't ask for better.

originalText.text:
Dr Chu is the best! She is thorough and caring and kind and she is just as great for little kids as she is for teenagers. My son has been a patient since he was a toddler and now he is 14 and actually looks forward to seeing her and catching up every year (as do I).

It’s also great that her office runs like clockwork and everyone is warm and welcoming.

text.text:
Dr Chu is the best! She is thorough and caring and kind and she is just as great for little kids as she is for teenagers. My son has been a patient since he was a toddler and now he is 14 and actually looks forward to seeing her and catching up every year (as do I).

It’s also great that her office runs like clockwork and everyone is warm and welcoming.

originalText.text:
A new patient to Dr. Chu. I am very pleased with our experience so far. Great first impression. Very knowledgeable, thorough, and explains the plan of care in detail. She was great with our baby, happy we chose her as our pediatrician.
The waiting rooms are separate to keep newborns in their own area which is great, we have been seen on time every time we went to an appointment, and the staff is very friendly!
